cast.name: 哈发艾尔·劳赞诺 Rafael Lozano

this_title: MEGALODEMOCRAT: The Public Art of Rafael Lozano-Hemmer
introduction: Rafael Lozano-Hemmer is one of the most acclaimed artists working in public space, but his pieces wouldn't exist without participation. Shot over 10 years in 17 countries, "Megalodemocrat" follows Rafael's breakout career creating large-scale works that entice an increasingly isolated public into transforming their cities and reconnecting with one another.
chinese_title: MEGALODEMOCRAT: The Public Art of Rafael Lozano-Hemmer
